name: openapi-clients
description: OpenAPI Clients for Holy Bible API

scripts.generate-all: npm run generate-typescript && npm run generate-python && npm run generate-go && npm run generate-rust && npm run generate-kotlin && npm run generate-java
scripts.generate-rust: rm -rf ./rust/package/src/generated && openapi-generator generate -i ./openapi.json -g rust -o ./rust/package/src/generated --skip-validate-spec && rm rust/package/src/generated/Cargo.toml
